event: severe atrophy of bilateral frontal and temporal lobes
sudden drop in BP to 70/40 mmHg
atrial fibrillation at varying rates 110-130 beats/min
administered 1 unit packed red blood cells
TEE showed contractility with adequate volume state
HR returned to 50 beats/min after synchronized cardioversion
high dose epinephrine 0.5-1.0 mg induced increasing BP
used vasopressin 4 units/h after 10 units bolus dose
stopped vasopressors completely at 24 h after surgery
